name: Leaflet map
description: The component allows you to work with the map.

properties.name: center
properties.label: Center
properties.handlerDescription: Used to set center on map.

properties.name: zoom
properties.label: Zoom
properties.handlerDescription: Used to set zoom on map.

properties.name: markers
properties.handlerDescription: Specifies an array of markers to display on the map. Signature of marker: {description, point}.

properties.name: circles
properties.handlerDescription: Specifies an array of circles to display on the map. Signature of circle: {description, point, radius}.

properties.name: polygons
properties.handlerDescription: Specifies an array of polygons to display on the map. Signature of polygon: {description, [points]}.

properties.name: mapType
properties.label: Map type
properties.handlerDescription: Used to set map type. Possible: carto, cartoDark, openStreet, cyclosm, esriWorldStreet

properties.name: zoomControl
properties.label: Zoom Control
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if zooming is allowed.

properties.name: draggingControl
properties.label: Dragging Control
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if dragging is allowed.

properties.name: mapTypeControl
properties.label: Map Type Control
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if map type changing is allowed.

properties.name: geopositionControl
properties.label: Geoposition Control
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if geoposition controlling is allowed.

properties.name: fullscreenControl
properties.label: Fullscreen Control
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if fullscreen controlling is allowed.

properties.name: fullscreen
properties.label: Fullscreen
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine fullscreen.

eventHandlers.name: onClick
eventHandlers.label: On Click Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event triggered when the user click on map.

eventHandlers.name: onMarkerClick
eventHandlers.label: On Marker Click Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event triggered when the user click on marker.

eventHandlers.name: onCircleClick
eventHandlers.label: On Circle Click Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event triggered when the user click on circle.

eventHandlers.name: onPolygonClick
eventHandlers.label: On Polygon Click Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event triggered when the user click on polygon.

eventHandlers.name: onMapTypeChange
eventHandlers.label: On Map Type Change Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event triggered when the user changed map type.

eventHandlers.name: onDeterminingGeoposition
eventHandlers.label: On Determining Geoposition Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event triggered when user determining geoposition.

eventHandlers.name: onFullscreenClick
eventHandlers.label: On Fullscreen Button Click Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event triggered when the user click on fullscreen button.
